text: Pascal Fauvel was an archer from France. He was born on 8 April 1882 and died on 22 October 1942. He competed in the 1920 Summer Olympics.Pascal FauvelPascal FAUVEL == References == Category:1882 births Category:1942 deaths Category:French archers Category:Olympic silver medalists for France Category:Olympic bronze medalists for France
title: Pascal Fauvel
